Instruction: Press tofu to remove excess water and cut into cubes.
Heat sesame oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add tofu cubes and cook until golden brown on all sides.
Add kimchi and green onions to the skillet.
Stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, or until heated through.
Add cooked rice to the skillet and break up any clumps.
Stir-fry until rice is heated through and coated in the kimchi flavor.
Season with soy sauce and gochujang to taste.
Serve immediately, garnished with sesame seeds.
